alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:26PM EDT until June 17 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bath County in east central Kentucky... Southeastern Fleming County in east central Kentucky... Rowan County in east central Kentucky... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1226 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ringos Mills, or 11 miles southeast of Flemingsburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Plummers Landing around 1230 PM EDT. Sharkey around 1235 PM EDT. Hilda around 1240 PM EDT. Hays Crossing around 1245 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Morehead and Haldeman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
